metadata.title: Annual Report of the Bering-Aleutian Salmon International Survey (BASIS), 2003
metadata.description: To document summaries of preliminary results of BASIS field research in 2003, as well as new results from ongoing analyses of 2002-2003 BASIS samples and data.
metadata.notes:
